Description:
EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:10+ Years working experience
Preferable; 3rd Level qualification in Quantity Surveying, Economics, Business, Engineering, Accounting or related disciplines
Industry Sector Experience, Oil & Gas, Energy, Industrial Gases ……
Contractual Form(s) experience
Extensive technical comprehension of Construction & EPC jobs and markets, of the industry (ideally in Oil & Gas & Industrial Gas sectors)
Competent knowledge & understanding of contract law and commercial/contracts management
Ability to quickly assimilate and retain data and information
Versatile, with ability to grasp broad variety of issues (technical and economic) that span from risk management to procurement, financial reporting and management of the supply chain
Flexibility and capability of identifying solutions
Demonstrated awareness to details in commercial agreements and implications in highly complex environments (impact on schedule, early identification of risks and opportunities).
Commercial writing skills to illustrate briefly, clearly and exhaustively the facts, the points of friction/misunderstanding, the probable outcome of such situation/behavior and the suggested solutions (addressing Client, Subcontractors and Vendors, partners and colleagues).
Ability to work with or without legal resources to draft contract clauses which capture the essential commercial issues of any situation
Conversant with operating in a ‘Functionally’ structured organization.
Analytical skills associated with developing and utilizing performance measures and cost savings COMPETENCIES:Not limited to Excel, Word, Outlook, PowerPoint, Access for the purpose of information retrieval in spreadsheets, word processing of documents and contracts and presentations of goals and results
Excellent knowledge of system and application for the construction and engineer industry eg. Cost Control Systems, DMS and Planning tools
Strong management and team leadership expertise (preferably with experience in Managing and Leading a multicultural group)
Ability to work in a multi-cultural environment
Developed negotiating skills (with both internal and external counterpart)
Ability to influence, motivate, mentor and build relationships
Strong sense of responsibility with a professional attitude and reputation
Solid problem solving, decision making and analytical capabilities
Proven organizational and analytical skills
Decisive and able to remain focused and thoroughJob Details
